projects.name: Bashundhara City
projects.description: The Sunrise Commercial Complex is a proposed multi-purpose construction project aimed at developing a modern, energy-efficient commercial hub in the heart of the city. The project includes the construction of two 8-story office buildings, an underground parking structure, a rooftop green space, and supporting infrastructure such as access roads, landscaping, and utility connections. The construction will be completed in multiple phases over a 24-month period, with an emphasis on sustainable building practices, safety, and timely delivery.
